value.original: Makes it possible to define components which are shown in the navigation bar in the main layout of the Openbravo user interface.

row.value: Makes it possible to define components which are shown in the navigation bar in the main layout of the Openbravo user interface.

value.original: A view is shown in the main user interface, the view implementation defines the javaclass responsible for generating the client-side javascript.

row.value: A view is shown in the main user interface, the view implementation defines the javaclass responsible for generating the client-side javascript.

value.original:
A view is shown in the user interface as a tab in the multi-tab interface or as a popup. The view can be anything from a grid, form or a popup window. When the view is shown in the multi-tab interface then it must be a Smartclient canvas.
The view implementation defines the component which is capable of generating the client side javascript to be shown in the browser. A view implementation is a java class which extends the org.openbravo.client.kernel.BaseTemplateComponent class.

row.value:
A view is shown in the user interface as a tab in the multi-tab interface or as a popup. The view can be anything from a grid, form or a popup window. When the view is shown in the multi-tab interface then it must be a Smartclient canvas.
The view implementation defines the component which is capable of generating the client side javascript to be shown in the browser. A view implementation is a java class which extends the org.openbravo.client.kernel.BaseTemplateComponent class.

value.original: Openbravo allows the customization of grid and form views. Customize windows and form views are stored once saved in the Window Personalization window.

row.value: Openbravo allows the customization of grid and form views. Customize windows and form views are stored once saved in the Window Personalization window.
